description:
This episode of Meisaku is inspired by "The Blue Bird." Musubi is looking for his "happiness," which, for him, means going viral on social media. And the Blue Bird of happiness appear in front of him...?!
It is a collaboration with a YouTube channel, "Hajimemashite Matsuo desu."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hello, I`m the Blue Bird of Happiness
はじめまして青い鳥です
